subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ryan Briscoe of Australia won the Indianapolis 500 pole with a daring late-afternoon run and a four-lap average of 226.484 miles per hour, edging James Hinchcliffe of Canada by 0.003 seconds.
snippet: Ryan Briscoe of Australia won the Indianapolis 500 pole with a daring late-afternoon run and a four-lap average of 226.484 miles per hour, edging James Hinchcliffe of Canada by 0.003 seconds.
